fields.title: Combo Discount for Steak and Fries
fields.description: 70% of customers who order Steak also add Fries to their meal. However, 30% of customers don't order any sides. By offering a combo discount that includes both the Steak and Fries, you can boost your sales while providing customers with an attractive, value-driven option. This will encourage higher order values and increase the overall customer satisfaction with meal pairing.

fields.title: Seafood Pasta Limited-Time Discount
fields.description: Your Seafood Pasta sales have dropped by 20% over the last two weeks. This could be due to seasonal demand fluctuations or shifts in customer preferences. A targeted, limited-time discount could reinvigorate interest in this dish, drawing in customers who may not have considered it recently. Combining the offer with a social media campaign could further amplify the visibility and drive traffic to your restaurant.

fields.title: Best-Selling T-Bone Steak Highlight
fields.description: Your Signature T-Bone Steak was the best-selling menu item last week, with over 120 orders in just 7 days. To capitalize on this momentum, consider featuring the steak on your social media channels as a Chefâ€™s Special or limited-time offer. Highlighting its popularity can build further customer interest, encouraging both repeat and new customers to try it, thus maintaining or even increasing its sales volume.

fields.title: Vegan Bowls Trending in Competitor Ads
fields.description: Recent competitor analysis shows that 35% of restaurant ads have been featuring Vegan Bowls. This is a significant trend, and since you already have a Vegan Bowl on your menu, now is the perfect time to highlight it. Consider promoting it through social media channels like Instagram and Facebook to catch the wave of this growing trend and attract health-conscious and environmentally aware customers who are seeking vegan options.

fields.title: Pumpkin Spice Trend in Local Cafes
fields.description: Seasonal items like Pumpkin Spice lattes and desserts are trending across local cafes, creating a buzz around autumnal flavors. Since this is a popular trend, consider adding your own Pumpkin Spice offering to the menu. Not only will this tap into the seasonal demand, but it will also keep your menu fresh and exciting for regular customers who are looking forward to autumn-themed items. Promote this offering through your website and social media to maximize visibility.

fields.title: Spicy Wings Social Media Challenge
fields.description: Spicy food challenges are gaining popularity on social media, especially with food influencers and online communities. Your Spicy Wings are the perfect match for this trend. Consider hosting a challenge where customers post photos or videos of themselves eating your Spicy Wings, with a chance to win a prize or get featured on your restaurant's social media pages. This will not only generate excitement around your menu but also help your restaurant gain visibility through user-generated content.
